creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Panel of k'ossu depicting the Taoist Immortal Lan Tsai Ho, with her emblem, the flower basket. She wears a pale blue coat and brick-red trousers. Mountainous landscape in shades of blue, green, tan, brown, yellow, and brick-red, with flower sprays and sacred fungus. Former Classification: Textiles - Tapestry
title: Panel Fragment
